channel.title: How to make a general store 317 pi?
channel.description: how would i make a general store so people could sell anything to and it show up for other players to buy?

item.title: How to make a general store 317 pi?
item.dc:creator: @tdawgzz tdawgzz
item.description:
@tdawgzz wrote:

Basically, it’s easier than you may think. If you want the npc to buy anything all you have to do is switch the two 2’s in the front to two 1’s and your all set! here’s the code to add in shops.cfg: shop = 44 I_BUY_ANYTHING 1 1

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a general store 317 pi?

@hadesflames wrote:

Most pi’s also have gen stores…He should be able to rip it off some random pi source that has it.

item.title: How to make a general store 317 pi?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

scenemo:

how would i make a general store so people could sell anything to and it show up for other players to buy?

Easiest way is to create an “ItemContainer” that basically has an array of items. Then all you have to do is when a player buys/sells an item, it cycles through each player that’s currently viewing that shop, and then sends the update item packet (53) for all the players with the updated items/amounts.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a general store 317 pi?

item.title: How to make a general store 317 pi?
item.dc:creator: @hadesflames hadesflames
item.description:
@hadesflames wrote:

I’m pretty sure 317’s come with general stores…Look at your shopassistant class to see if there’s a shop id set for a general store. If there is, then your server has one. If there isn’t, get a different source.

Read full topic
